attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN
attributes.review:
THIS APP IS. THE. WORST.

HIDE YO KIDS, HIDE YO WIFE, HIDE YO MOM, HIDE YO DOG.

when i opened the app, i was APPALLED to see a picture of a crusty orange cheeto with a bleach blonde toupee. it was so bad that i almost threw up in my mouth. 

THEN it asked me to enter my PERSONAL INFORMATION such as my PHONE NUMBER and EMAIL ADDRESS. 

after having seen those CURSED images and the sketchy looking homepage i immediately closed out the app and deleted it. 

but i fear, we are too late.
please. hide everyone you hold dear. 

they’re coming.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: Not helpful, offensive and all around disappointing. Downloaded in hopes of seeing change but now my eyes are burning❤️also gives misleading information.

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: I absolutely hate this app when you open it the first thing you see is a terrifying picture and why would anyone download this app TikTok lives matter ✊✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: He is running kids hope people get happy kids get inspired he will ruin America if he take apps away he is racist kids are in cages  and he deported my dogs old owner and their lover got a hart attack when she realized

attributes.title: I will be in contact with my lawyers
attributes.review: This app is very traumatizing, 10/10 would not recommend. All in all I will always be emotionally damaged because of this app so as of now I am reviewing my legal options.

attributes.title: disappointed😔
attributes.review: i opened the app and saw trump and wanted to VOMIT. after seeing that big lump of fat getting spray tanned i said😳. this app is weird and USES YOUR LOCATION EVEN WHEN ITS CLOSED. i don’t want him knowing where i am😳😳😳 he might come and take me😳😳😳

attributes.title: The truth
attributes.review: This app is not it hun. Like I doesn’t give you facts about him being racist, homophobic, or sexist. Just tried to show him as the protagonist which we all know he’s the antagonist. And that’s all I’m gonna say have a great day 🤪🥴💕🔪.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: As a transgender, pansexual, sexually attracted helicopter, virgin with 3 kids, I find this app very appalling. The second I opened it, a photo of an elephant mating ritual appeared. Although I was intrigued by it due to my interest in said topics, I did not wish to see it.

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: ugh the big orange man on the front is making me SICK. i cant be on an app that constantly makes me nauseous the orange dirty color radiating off of the racist rapist is disgusting. can believe a whale can get his own app. guess they’re letting anyone in now huh ❤️

attributes.title: Definitely not worth it 👎🏼
attributes.review: This app is one of the worst apps I’ve ever installed. It’s is full of lies and hate content. It is so confusing and it’s all about a sexist, homophobic, xenophobic, mentally unstable idiot. I’m sorry but I just have to say no to this.
